entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:56 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
